price: Kandi nta wundi uwuhakana usibye urengera (imbibi za Allah) w’umunyabyaha,
arabic: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِۦٓ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعۡتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wamā yukadhibu bihi illā kullu muʿ'tadin athīmin
